modName: Useful Investor and Master Trader Perks
summary: Mod simply changes the value of investing in a business and perk bonus of Master Trader perk in Skyrim. Makes them "5000 gold" instead of 500(Investor) and 1000(Master Trader).
descriptionHtml:
=== [b][color=#ffd966][size=3]Description[/size][/color][/b] ===


Mod simply changes the value of investing a business and the bonus of Master Trader perk in Skyrim. Makes them "5000 gold" each instead of 500(Investor) and 1000(Master Trader).

So, when you want to invest in a business in Skyrim you will pay 5000 gold to the merchant and his/her money will increase 5000 gold permanently. And when you get the Master Trader perk it will add 5000 gold to every merchant in Skyrim.



=== [color=#ffd966][size=3][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color] ===

If you already have mods that increases merchants' default golds then be careful because once they've reached "42750 golds" it gets buggy.
It can be incompatible with the mods that changes values in Investor and Master Trader perks like perk overhaul mods. If you do have one, simply place mine at the bottom of your load order or merge them with TES5edit.
author: Voixdeville
